sect1.title: Build Flags
sect1.para: We will need to copy our build variables into our new system:

screen.userinput: echo export BUILD32=\""${BUILD32}\"" >> ${CLFS}/root/.bash_profile echo export BUILDN32=\""${BUILDN32}\"" >> ${CLFS}/root/.bash_profile echo export BUILD64=\""${BUILD64}\"" >> ${CLFS}/root/.bash_profile echo export CLFS_TARGET32=\""${CLFS_TARGET32}\"" >> \ ${CLFS}/root/.bash_profile
